AddNotificationChannels.name: AddNotificationChannels
AddNotificationChannels.description:
Grants permission to add up to 2 topic ARNs of existing AWS SNS topics to publish
                                                notifications

BatchGetFrameMetricData.name: BatchGetFrameMetricData
BatchGetFrameMetricData.description: Grants permission to get the frame metric data for a Profiling Group

ConfigureAgent.name: ConfigureAgent
ConfigureAgent.description:
Grants permission for an agent to register with the orchestration service and retrieve
                                                profiling configuration information

CreateProfilingGroup.name: CreateProfilingGroup
CreateProfilingGroup.description: Grants permission to create a profiling group

DeleteProfilingGroup.name: DeleteProfilingGroup
DeleteProfilingGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a profiling group

DescribeProfilingGroup.name: DescribeProfilingGroup
DescribeProfilingGroup.description: Grants permission to describe a profiling group

GetFindingsReportAccountSummary.name: GetFindingsReportAccountSummary
GetFindingsReportAccountSummary.description:
Grants permission to get a summary of recent recommendations for each profiling group
                                                in the account

GetNotificationConfiguration.name: GetNotificationConfiguration
GetNotificationConfiguration.description: Grants permission to get the notification configuration

GetPolicy.name: GetPolicy
GetPolicy.description:
Grants permission to get the resource policy associated with the specified Profiling
                                                Group.

GetProfile.name: GetProfile
GetProfile.description: Grants permission to get aggregated profiles for a specific profiling group

ListFindingsReports.name: ListFindingsReports
ListFindingsReports.description:
Grants permission to list the available recommendations reports for a specific profiling
                                                group

ListProfileTimes.name: ListProfileTimes
ListProfileTimes.description:
Grants permission to list the start times of the available aggregated profiles for
                                                a specific profiling group

ListProfilingGroups.name: ListProfilingGroups
ListProfilingGroups.description: Grants permission to list profiling groups in the account

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a Profiling Group

PostAgentProfile.name: PostAgentProfile
PostAgentProfile.description:
Grants permission to submit a profile collected by an agent belonging to a specific
                                                profiling group for aggregation

PutPermission.name: PutPermission
PutPermission.description:
Grants permission to update the list of principals allowed for an action group in
                                                the resource policy associated with the specified Profiling Group.

RemoveNotificationChannel.name: RemoveNotificationChannel
RemoveNotificationChannel.description:
Grants permission to delete an already configured SNStopic arn from the notification
                                                configuration

RemovePermission.name: RemovePermission
RemovePermission.description:
Grants permission to remove the permission of specified Action Group from the resource
                                                policy associated with the specified Profiling Group.

SubmitFeedback.name: SubmitFeedback
SubmitFeedback.description: Grants permission to submit user feedback for useful or non useful anomaly

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add or overwrite tags to a Profiling Group

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a Profiling Group

UpdateProfilingGroup.name: UpdateProfilingGroup
UpdateProfilingGroup.description: Grants permission to update a specific profiling group
